invalidPassword: Password must contain at least 8 characters.
pleaseCheckYourInboxOrJunk: Please check your inbox or junk mail folder for an email from support@fitfortis.com.
youNeedToClickTheLink: You need to click the link in that email to confirm your email address before you can sign in.
alphanumericError: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
characterError: Passwords must have at least one non alphanumeric character.
lowercaseError: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
uppercaseError: Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
